summary: Makes Ulfrics cloths heavy armour equal to Ebony armour.
descriptionHtml:
This tiny mod makes Ulfric\'s cloths into heavy armour for a 30+level character and is for those who prefer a more Viking warrior look to heavy plate. The armour replaces one of the versions of steel armour and can be forged at any smithy, although as it is equal to ebony the required ingredients for forging and upgrading are high level. This mod will probably make Ulfirc quite tough for the imperial campaign (not tested). 

To install unzip to Skyrim Data folder and make sure the .ESP is enabled at start-up.
author: Laz3456
